hoatChat: Amoxicillin (dưới dạng amoxicillin trihydrat); Acid clavulanic (dưới dạng kali clavulanat)
taDuoc: Silic dioxid dạng keo khan (Aerosil-200), croscarmellose natri (Ac di sol), cellulose vi tinh thể (Avicel PH 200), magnesi stearat, hydroxy propyl methyl cellulose (HPMC-15 cps), dibutyl phthalat, talc tinh chế, titan dioxid, isopropyl alcohol, methylen chlorid
